page.title: 08Chew Valley Digest
page.content: The Chew Valley Digest is our local free newspaper. It advertises many shops and firms in the district. It covers a wide range of local activities such as the Cricket Club, the Darts League, etc........ It also has articles about people in the Chew Valley e.g.in July 1985's issue there was a piece about a local resident of Chew Magna who is going to compete in the World Games for the deaf, which are to be held in Los Angeles later in the month. There was also an article headed'Who's Who in the Chew Valley' which gave a list of all the Churches,Drama Groups, Schools and Sports Groups in the Valley.Other articles referred to the opening of a new bowling club at Chew Stoke,the forthcoming Comprehensive School Summer Fayre and the Primary Schools' Football League.
